ai-tika-vin09t6:1_0: The first training rule on acknowledgment
ai-tika-vin09t6:2_0: for the purpose of eating post-midday tonics, the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
ai-tika-vin09t6:2_1: I stay on topic, but not in the same way.
ai-tika-vin09t6:3_0: The first training rule on acknowledgment is finished.
ai-tika-vin09t6:4_0: The second training rule on acknowledgment
ai-tika-vin09t6:5_0: ‘The sound of the drums, this is the sound of the mosel, that is the demonstration of revealing.’
ai-tika-vin09t6:6_0: The second training rule on acknowledgment is finished.
ai-tika-vin09t6:7_0: The fourth training rule on acknowledgment
ai-tika-vin09t6:8_0: if she receives or interrupts in the monastery or in the vicinity of the monastery or in the monastery, tells, whether in the monastery or in the vicinity of the monastery or in the vicinity of the monastery or in the vicinity of the monastery;
ai-tika-vin09t6:9_0: If he is eating within the monastery, and he eats it, there is no offense.
ai-tika-vin09t6:9_1: You should receive requisites belonging to the Sangha, thinking, ‘It’s unsurpassed because of the limbs,’ or then they may receive it from the vicinity of the bed,’
ai-tika-vin09t6:9_2: if, after within a monastery, he shows it to the vicinity of the monastery.
ai-tika-vin09t6:9_3: ‘The sound of the drums, this is the sound of the mosel, that is the demonstration of revealing.’
ai-tika-vin09t6:10_0: The fourth training rule entailing acknowledgment is finished.
ai-tika-vin09t6:11_0: The chapter on offenses entailing acknowledgment is finished.
